metadata.title: CVE-2023-39321 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Processing an incomplete post-handshake message for a QUIC connection cancause a panic.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39321` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.21 - 1.21.1-1~ubuntu20.04.1
golang-1.21-go - 1.21.1-1~ubuntu20.04.1
golang-1.21-src - 1.21.1-1~ubuntu20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.21 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.21.1-1~ubuntu20.04.1').
